```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
saldo_2007 <- read.csv("Desktop/cr-data/statnipokladna/saldo_2007_2009.csv", colClasses = c("year"="character"))
saldo_2010 <- read.csv("Desktop/cr-data/statnipokladna/saldo_2010_2020.csv", colClasses = c("year"="character"))
```

```{r}
saldo_2007$year <- as.Date(paste(saldo_2007$year, "/01", sep=""), format="%Y/%m/%d")
saldo_2007$year<- format(saldo_2007$year, "%Y")
```

```{r}
saldo_2010 <- saldo_2010[,c(2,1,5)]
saldo_2010 <- saldo_2010%>%rename("Saldo_CZK"="saldo")
merged <- rbind(saldo_2007, saldo_2010)
merged$year <- sapply(merged$year, as.numeric)
```

```{r}
write.csv(merged, "Desktop/cr-data/statnipokladna/saldo_2007_2020.csv")
```
